title: Gateway to Happiness - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Fantasy   Historical   Josei   Martial Arts   Romance
tags: Age Progression   Ancient China   Artists   Beautiful Female Lead   Calm Protagonist   Child Protagonist   Clever Protagonist   Cute Children   Female Protagonist   Heartwarming   Tomboyish Female Lead   Transmigration
author: Yi Yi Lan Xi   依依兰兮
description:
Lu Zheng had transmigrated into a baby in a swaddle. She wondered if she should laugh or cry.

What? She was abandoned to a peasant family by her biological parents again?

It was time to cry this time!

So what if it were a peasant family? As long as her heart was set, she could still lead the splendid life that she wanted!

However, she was not prepared for what lay ahead of her. Because of a secret which she accidentally overheard, she was forced by an unscrupulous young neighbor to leave her foster parents and hometown together with him. Since then, her future was accompanied by challenges and things kind of sidetracked from what she had planned.>
